alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 10:17AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches with as much as 16 inches for the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 5 AM Monday: Jacob Lake 4 to 8 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
